item.title: Using Python to Analyze Data
item.description: Though I am most familiar with R, Python is another language that is quite useful when organizing and analyzing data. Here, I use the infamous ‘iris’ dataset to demonstrate some basic data analysis functionalities of Python. iris[["sepal length (cm)", "petal width (cm)"]] ## sepal length (cm) petal width (cm) ## 0 5.1 0.2 ## 0 4.9 0.2 ## 0 4.7 0.2 ## 0 4.6 0.2 ## 0 5.0 0.2 ## .
